title: New secretaries appointed to two ministries
body_lines: President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has appointed two secretaries to the Ministry of Women, Child Affairs and Social Empowerment and the Ministry of Technology and Investment Promotion.
This was announced in a gazette notification published on Friday (June 17).
• H. K. W. M. N. B. Hapuhinna - Secretary Ministry of Women, Child Affairs and Social Empowerment
• Jayantha de Silva - Secretary Ministry of Technology and Investment Promotion
